document.heading: BREWERY MANUFACTURER'S TASTING PERMIT AMENDMENT ACT OF 2011

history.narrative: Law 19-25, the “Brewery Manufacturer’s Tasting Permit Amendment Act of 2011”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-118, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 7, 2011, and July 12, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 28, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-102 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-25 became effective on October 20, 2011.
